CommandDefinition.Name: listTimeZones
CommandDefinition.Description: Lists time zones for use with cron like orders.

BoolOption.Name: v
BoolOption.Description: Shows additional information like the time offset and support of daylight saving time (DST)

BoolOption.Name: w
BoolOption.Description: Shows time zones for the whole world (by default only time zones matching the local time offset and GMT-like time zones are listed)
